thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Yahaira Carrion

author: Yahaira Carrion
title: Yahaira Carrion
text: At first I wasn't sure what to expect from this company because it seemed to good to be true. I went and checked out their website. It was really easy to get around their website and easy to customize my purchase. I love that they have the first time customer discount that encouraged me to give them a try. I am very happy that I did. I messed up my order and had to get in contact with them. I immediately got a response from them. They were super friendly, attentive, and all about making sure I was happy with my product and the service I received. It was definitely worth it. Once I received my product I loved the box the product is as expected good quality. I can truly say I'm happy I tried them out and will continue to order from them. Hope to see their product locally soon!
